dcterms:creator: B. Mildenhall
P. P. Srinivasan
M. Tancik
J. T. Barron
R. Ramamoorthi
R. Ng
dcterms:description: The NeRF synthetic dataset contains 8 synthetic scenes, with 800 × 800 images captured from a full 360° around an object, simulated via Blender. It includes realistic simulations of non-Lambertian materials, including reflections and transparency, and provides exact camera poses, including camera intrinsics.
dcterms:title: NeRF synthetic dataset
